attributes.action: Scrap council taxes a separate bill and include this in income tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently millions do not pay council tax when they should e.g. men who live with single mothers or those that do not appear 'on the books' This way everyone that works contributes. This would also avoid people getting into debt with their council tax, and would be a more transparent honest way of showing the taxpayer each month what their actual deductions are, instead of this stealth tax!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/End-Council-Tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
